title: Kenda’s Contenders for the 2024 Life Time Grand Prix
content:
The tire company is supporting Alexey Vermeulen, Hannah Otto, Cole Paton, and Erin Huck, four riders with huge potential in the series.

Read the full article at Kenda’s Contenders for the 2024 Life Time Grand Prix on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
